steps: decided to learn how to make pottery
find a pottery class that is near
sign up to the class and pay
find the time and place for the class
make a piece of pottery for final exam
fire the the piece of pottery for final exam

branching_info.option 1: try to take the class at a local community center
branching_info.option 2: try to take the class online
freeform_ra: want to get involved with the community
want to try different classes before committing
want to make pottery for the new apartment
